# Web SDK Examples: Annotations

> These are interactive Nutrient Playground examples. Click any link to try the code in your browser.
> 
> For local runnable examples, see [web/annotation/README.md](../web/annotation/README.md).

---

## Annotations

- [Watermark from text annotation](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BXG4gICAgICAgIGluc3RhbmNlLnBhZ2VJbmZvRm9ySW5kZXgocGFnZUluZGV4KVxuICAgICAgKVxuICAgIClcbiAgKS5yZWR1Y2UoKGFjYywgcGFnZUluZm8pID0%%253D)

  - Dynamically add watermark text annotations to PDF pages before flattening them into a document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A6ydoCpCKMI)

- [Flatten annotation on annotation create](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJqcyI6IlBTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoeyAuLi5iYXNlT3B0aW9ucywgdGhlbWU6IFBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUksgfSkudGhlbihcbiAgKGluc3RhbmNlKSA9PiB7XG4gICAgaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcihcImFubm90YXRpb25zLmNyZWF0ZVwiLCAoYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMpID0%252BIHtcbiAgICAgIC8vIEFzc3VtaW5nIHdlIHdhbnQgdG8gZmxhdHRlbiBhbm5vdGF0aW9ucyBvbiB0aGUgcGFnZSB3aGVyZSB0aGUgYW5ub3RhdGlvbiB3YXMgYWRkZWRcbiAgICAgIGNvbnN0IHBhZ2VJbmRleGVzID0gQXJyYXkuZnJvbShcbiAgICAgICAgbmV3IFNldChhbm5vdGF0aW9ucy5tYXAoKGFubm90YXRpb24pID0%)

- [Remove inline text selection toolbar on text select](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIHtcbiAgY29uc29sZS5sb2coXCJOdXRyaWVudCBsb2FkZWQhIGJ5IE5hcmFzaGltYW5cIik7XG59KTtcbiIsIm1vZGUiOiJzdGFuZGFsb25lIn0%253D)

- [Bulk delete all annotations](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJqcyI6Ii8vIEJ1bGsgZGVsZXRlIEFMTCBhbm5vdGF0aW9uc1xuUFNQREZLaXQubG9hZCh7XG5cdC4uLmJhc2VPcHRpb25zLFxuXHR0aGVtZTogUFNQREZLaXQuVGhlbWUuREFSS1xufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%%)
  - After the viewer loads, it gathers annotations from every page, flattens their IDs, and deletes them in a single operation. It uses `totalPageCount` with `getAnnotations` and an async IIFE to run the cleanup immediately.

- [Straighten freeform highlight](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D) 
  - Convert freeform ink annotations into highlight annotations. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dJuIdtBJdcA)

- [Add ink stroke color preset to custom buttons](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%%%252FIFsuLi50b29sYmFyLCBpdGVtLCByZWRJbmtUb29sLCBibHVlSW5rVG9vbF1cbiAgICAgICAgICA6IFsuLi50b29sYmFyLCBpdGVtXSxcbiAgICAgIFtdXG4gICAgKVxuICApO1xufSk7XG4ifQ%253D%253D)
  - Customize the toolbar to add two custom ink annotation buttons — one for red ink and one for blue ink — alongside the default ink annotation tool. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5c1Djroucjk)

- [Custom outlines for shape annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%%253D%253D)
  - Customize shape annotations by adding an outline. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MFHv_CDwKU)

- [Customize annotation creators](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252Be2NvbnN0IHNlbGVjdE5vZGU9ZG9jdW1lbnQuY3JlYXRlRWxlbWVudCgnc2VsZWN0Jyk7c2VsZWN0Tm9kZS5pbm5lckhUTUw9Y3JlYXRvcnMubWFwKChjcmVhdG9yPT5gPG9wdGlvbiB2YWx1ZT1cIiR7Y3JlYXRvcn1cIj4ke2NyZWF0b3J9PC9vcHRpb24%%)
  - Create and customize stamp annotations with multiple creators. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=etJAe9bJzic)

- [Prevent dragging of annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%252FaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0RWRpdGluZ0Fubm90YXRpb24oYW5ub3RhdGlvbix7YXV0b1NlbGVjdFRleHQ6ITF9KTpcbi8vSGFuZGxpbmcgc3BlY2lhbCBjYXNlIGZvciBOb3RlcyBzbGlnaGx0eSBkaWZmZXJlbnQgdGhhbiBUZXh0IEFubm90YXRpb25zXG5hbm5vdGF0aW9uIGluc3RhbmNlb2YgUFNQREZLaXQuQW5ub3RhdGlvbnMuTm90ZUFubm90YXRpb24%)
  - Allow special behavior for text and note annotations, while preserving default behaviors for forms and links, and restrict dragging for other annotation types.

- [Restrict dragging and editing ink annotations and signatures](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Prevent users from editing or dragging ink annotations and ink signatures, but allow them to delete them.

- [Programmatically create a comment thread](https://nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Programmatically add a comment marker annotation and an associated comment while setting the annotation creator’s name. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zaan1UNYlZ8)

- [Open URL from image annotation](https://nutrient.io/playground?)

- [Display highlighted text in annotation sidebar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D) 
  - Customize the annotation sidebar to display highlighted text and allow annotation editing (except for signatures). — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fs1eeMrkXEQ)

- [Log the print activity in the sidebar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%%%%252BXG4gICAgICA8cGF0aCBkPVwiTTE5IDNINWMtMS4xIDAtMiAuOS0yIDJ2MTRjMCAxLjEuOSAyIDIgMmgxNGMxLjEgMCAyLS45IDItMlY1YzAtMS4xLS45LTItMi0yem0tNSAxNEg3di0yaDd2MnptMy00SDd2LTJoMTB2MnptMC00SDdWN2gxMHYyelwiLz5cbiAgICA8L3N2Zz5gLFxuICAgIG9uUHJlc3M6IChldmVudCwgaWQpID0%252BIHtcbiAgICAgIGluc3RhbmNlLnNldFZpZXdTdGF0ZSgodmlld1N0YXRlKSA9PlxuICAgICAgICB2aWV3U3RhdGUuc2V0KFwic2lkZWJhck1vZGVcIiwgXCJDVVNUT01cIilcbiAgICAgICk7XG4gICAgfSxcbiAgfTtcbiAgXG4gIGNvbnN0IHRvb2xiYXJJdGVtcyA9IE51dHJpZW50Vmlld2VyLmRlZmF1bHRUb29sYmFySXRlbXMucmVkdWNlKFxuICAgIChhY2MsIGl0ZW0pID0%)

- [Hide link annotations tooltip](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Hide the popover element when a link annotation is selected. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sCyG5hdG10)

- [Toggle all Annotation to show/hide with a custom button in toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)

<!-- 
- [Handle interactions with notes attached to annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%) 
  -->

- [Use custom renderers to display annotation information on hover](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BPC9kaXY%252BYDtcblxuICAgICAgcmV0dXJuIHtcbiAgICAgICAgbm9kZTogdG9vbHRpcENvbnRhaW5lcixcbiAgICAgICAgYXBwZW5kOiB0cnVlLFxuICAgICAgfTtcbiAgICB9LFxuICB9LFxufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%252BIHtcbiAgLy8gRGlzYWJsZSBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIGVkaXRpbmdcbiAgaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0RWRpdGFibGVBbm5vdGF0aW9uVHlwZXMoW10pO1xuXG4gIC8vIEhlbHBlciBmdW5jdGlvbiB0byBmaW5kIGFubm90YXRpb24gZWxlbWVudCBieSBJRFxuICBjb25zdCBnZXRBbm5vdGF0aW9uRWxlbWVudCA9IChhbm5vdGF0aW9uSWQpID0%%%252BXG4gICAgaGFuZGxlQW5ub3RhdGlvbkludGVyYWN0aW9uKGV2ZW50LCBmYWxzZSlcbiAgKTtcbn0pO1xuIiwibW9kZSI6InN0YW5kYWxvbmUifQ%253D%253D)
  - Enhance annotations by adding hover-based tooltips while preventing edits. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=drdvz12ntlE)

- [Create highlight annotations programmatically from search](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%)
  - Search for specific text values in a document, create highlight annotations for the found text, and apply those annotations to the document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tzRcFwRbaE4)

- [Use custom actions with the embedded PDF widget button](https://nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - Create a button form field, add an event listener to handle button clicks that trigger a file input for uploading images, and attach the selected image as an annotation in the document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ghmh4sjwUic)

- [Prevent showing note annotation content on hover](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Add an event listener to hide the note annotation popover when the mouse is over the note icon. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wspjZ_mjLBw)

- [Link comments with annotations](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comment-annotations)
  - When an annotation is selected, a tooltip appears, allowing users to create a linked comment marker annotation. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gevho94VSmk)

- [Create annotations from the clipboard](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/create-annotation-from-clipboard)
  - Enable pasting content from the clipboard onto a PDF as a text or image annotation. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1N3U0voT4Tc)

- [Navigate annotations with a custom toolbar button](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/get-all-annotations-boundingBox)
  - Get all annotation coordinates and seamlessly navigate with a custom “Next Annotation” button that highlights and jumps to each annotation. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BprV9kSGBlU)

- [Snip and save annotations as JPEG images](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-nutrient/tree/master/web/annotation/snipping-annotation)
  - Snip the area covered by an annotation and save it as a JPEG image. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLSBa6X4tmU)

- [Add a timestamp as a subtitle to a custom stamp](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIChcbiAgICAgICAgLy8gRXZlcnkgdGltZSBTdGFtcHMgTGlzdCBvcGVucywgd2Ugd2FudCB0byBzZXQgY29ycmVjdCBkYXRlIHRvIGN1c3RvbSBzdGFtcHNcbiAgICAgICAgaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0U3RhbXBBbm5vdGF0aW9uVGVtcGxhdGVzKCh0ZW1wbGF0ZXMpID0%252BXG4gICAgICAgICAgdGVtcGxhdGVzLm1hcCgodGVtcGxhdGUpID0%%253D)
  - Add a custom stamp annotation template with dynamic subtitle text (including the current date and time), and set up the UI to update the subtitle each time the stamps list is opened. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TseqHd_MWcI)

- [Add PDF file as custom stamp](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)

- [Add and count a checkmark annotation in the toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - Use a custom toolbar button for toggling stamp creation mode, allowing users to add "Accepted" stamp annotations on page press and track the total count of such annotations across a document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kaEmxWfG2bA)

- [Strike through text using a line annotation and automatically add a text annotation above](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%)

- [Cut, copy, and paste an annotation between pages](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJjc3MiOiIvKiBBZGQgeW91ciBDU1MgaGVyZSAqL1xuIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsiZmlsZU5hbWUiOiJiYXNpYy5wZGYifSwianMiOiJQU1BERktpdC5sb2FkKHtcbiAgLi4uYmFzZU9wdGlvbnMsXG4gIHRoZW1lOiBQU1BERktpdC5UaGVtZS5EQVJLLFxuICBlbmFibGVDbGlwYm9hcmRBY3Rpb25zOiB0cnVlLFxufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%252BIHtcbiAgY29uc29sZS5sb2coXCJOdXRyaWVudCBsb2FkZWQhIC0gYnkgTmFyYXNoaW1hblwiKTtcblxuICAvLyBDbGlwYm9hcmQgYWN0aW9uc1xuICBjb25zdCBjb3B5ID0ge1xuICAgIHR5cGU6IFwiY3VzdG9tXCIsXG4gICAgdGl0bGU6IFwiQ29weVwiLFxuICAgIG9uUHJlc3M6IGFzeW5jICgpID0%%%%%%253D)

- [Drop stamp annotations from the toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%253D%253D)

- [Custom rendering of link annotations with pins](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%252BIHsgfSk7XG4ifQ%253D%253D)

- [Skip the Delete confirmation popup dialog for annotations](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - This hook listens for the annotation deletion start event and immediately deletes the targeted annotation. It then clicks the dialog’s Cancel button to suppress the confirmation UI. The result is a seamless delete action with no popup interrupting the workflow
